data.name: OVR Locomotion Effect : Anti-VR Sickness
data.detailed_description:
OVR Locomotion Effect is an overlay tool that aims to reduce VR (motion) sickness. It displays comfortable effect to HMD with thumb-stick input. You can use the effect to all SteamVR games.

Discord Server

Here is an official discord server.



(https://discord.gg/G4kkvfn)

Free Demo

We recommend trying the demo first before making your purchase. It is a fully featured, but time-limited for each try. It should be compatible with any VR game in your library. See if it helps reduce VR sickness for you.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2824713700

Anti-VR sickness effect with thumb-stick inputs


Displays VR-sickness reducing effect on the HMD based on your control inputs. After initial setup, the effect may be applied to any SteamVR game.

Dashboard settings


Quickly adjust effects on the SteamVR dashboard.

Various effects


There are vignette, room, point and wind effects. These effects can be combined use. You can adjust it to be barely visible or cover a large portion of the field of view.

Gamepad


Gamepad supported. Get rid of the sickness from your VR mods.

User guide

https://steamcommunity.com/app/1393780/discussions/0/3410928883774809184/

FAQ

https://steamcommunity.com/app/1393780/discussions/0/2943620809085398243/

Bug reports and requests

Steam forum

https://steamcommunity.com/app/1393780/discussions/

Discord
https://discord.gg/G4kkvfn

Twitter
https://twitter.com/kurohuku7

Developer's streaming
https://twitch.tv/kurohuku7
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCovXehZKRZYfLT1tQVwry3A

data.short_description: "OVR Locomotion Effect" is an overlay tool that aims to reduce VR sickness. It displays anti-sickness effect to HMD by controller input. You may use this tool on any SteamVR games since the effect is displayed as an overlay in front of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: ８ GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
